Dill Pickles

20 min + 48 hours | Makes 1 pint
In a pinch, sub in seedless cucumbers for the Kirbys.

basics   cucumber   cure   dill   diy-project   kosher   make-ahead   pickle   snack   spring   to-do   vegan
Made with love and many mistakes by Sharon Brener.
